title: Artisans of Australia
creator_credit: Paul Humfress, Pamela Paddon and Film Australia
brief_description: A four part tape that features master stonemason George Proudmen, moulder Jack Thomas, stained glass artist Kevin Little and axemen Bill Boyd and Mark Gardner at work during conservation and restoration work on National Estate places such as Coolamine Homestead, Garrison Holy Trinity Church and the Sydney Technical College at Ultimo.
creator_credit_for_label: Paul Humfress, Pamela Paddon and Film Australia
